comments: Wright (DET) moves toward Brogdon (IND) with his hands slightly extended forward and marginal contact occurs with Brogdon's front.
Plumlee (DET) establishes a legal guarding position in Brogdon's (IND) path and absorbs the contact made with Brogdon along the sideline.
Ellington (DET) legally contests Holiday's (IND) jump shot attempt.
Grant (DET) goes to, not through, Holiday's (IND) space as he backs Holiday down in the post.
Brogdon (IND) brings his right arm toward Wright's (DET) front and marginal contact occurs as Brogdon naturally releases away.
LeVert (IND) and Grant (DET) make incidental arm contact with one another during rebounding.
Wright (DET) establishes his right foot as his pivot after picking up his dribble and legally lifts it to pass.
Turner (IND) moves toward Wright (DET) and marginal body contact occurs as Wright is passing.
LeVert (IND) makes contact across Plumlee's (DET) arms during his upward shooting motion, causing him to lose control of the ball.
Plumlee (DET) is moving alongside Sabonis' (IND) path with his left arm in a vertical position and absorbs the marginal contact made with Sabonis during the driving shot attempt.
Grant (DET) is already losing control of the ball on his own before any incidental arm contact is made by Brogdon (IND).
Wright (DET) cleanly strips Sabonis (IND) of the ball after Sabonis dribbles it off of his knee.
Grant (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in LeVert's (IND) path and gives LeVert room to avoid the contact.
Brogdon (IND) is moving toward Wright (DET) as marginal body contact occurs during the drive.
Turner's (IND) left hand brushes Wright's (DET) left arm and marginal contact occurs at the end of the drive.

Wright (DET) leaves his feet and is the first player to touch the ball after he voluntarily releases it before returning to the floor.  The baseline official whistles a possible out-of-bounds violation and signals for replay, but after the referee crew conferences, they do not go to replay review and correctly call a traveling violation
Sabonis (IND) establishes himself in a screening position in Wright's (DET) path and absorbs the contact.
Sabonis (IND) re-establishes himself in a screening position in Wright's (DET) path and marginal contact occurs as he sets the pick.
Bey (DET) and Brogdon (IND) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
Bey (DET) commits a take foul on Brogdon (IND).
Grant (DET) and Sumner (IND) come together at the same spot and incidental body contact occurs during the inbound.
Replay review of the foul called on Holiday (IND) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. Holiday jumps toward Grant (DET) and initiates body contact during Grant's follow-through.
Grant (DET) commits a take foul on Sabonis (IND).
